## What problem are you trying to solve?

Explain the use case.
If this is hypothetical or “might be nice someday”, say so.

## Proposed solution

What should GitVersionJS do?

## Alternatives considered

Any other approaches you’ve thought about?

## Additional context

Branch naming, tag strategy, CI constraints, examples, etc.
